name: Poker Hacker - a brain training for Poker players
name_original: Poker Hacker - a brain training for Poker players
description:
Poker Hacker is a brain training app designed to help you continuously improve your Poker memory and intelligence.

Poker Haker implements effective dual-n-back training technique - scientifically proven method of powering the 'fluid intelligence'.

When you have mastered Poker Hacker dynamic manipulating in memory with possible card combinations will become effortless!

Poker Hacker training method based on the 'dual n-back' exercise. A study* showed that such exercises could improve fluid intelligence ('the ability to reason and to solve new problems independently of previously acquired knowledge') by training with a 'demanding working memory task'. Whereas the stimuli in the study were auditory and visual, the stimuli for Poker Hacker are both visual (sectors and cards) and poker-focused.

Reported benefits of dual-n-back training include:

• Increased IQ
• Increased fluid intelligence
• Increased short-term memory performance
• Decreased distractibility
• Reduced ADHD symptoms
• Increased self-control and emotional stability

For Poker, when Poker Hacker skills have been mastered, this means that a player should be able to visualize many possible card combinations at once (keeping all of them in his working memory), stay focused and not let distractions (including emotional ones) sidetrack him during games.

*) http://www.pnas.org/content/105/19/6829.full
